sourceCode.description: Link to to the bot's source code.

readyTimeout.description:
If the bot doesn't connect to Discord after this many seconds, the process will terminate.
Set to 0 to never terminate.

levenshteinThreshold.description:
Minimum string similarity of search result and queried search.
Results below this number won't be queued.
Used to prevent unintentionally queueing random videos.

activityString.description: What Discord shows the bot is listening to.

colourTheme.description:
This is the colour that embeds will have.
Must be a HEX colour string (and start with a #).

maxQueueSize.description:
Won't allow adding items to queues greater than or equal to this in length.
Set to `0` to have no maximum size.

volumeModifier.description: Modifies the playback volume, valid range is between 0 and 1, with 1 being no modification and 0 muting audio entirely.

maxReadyTime.description:
The maximum time to wait (in seconds) for the bot to connect and start playing audio once.
Connecting and playing audio counts as 2 seperate tasks, so the maximum time to connect AND play is 2 x this value

inactivityTimeout.description:
The maximum time (in seconds) Jukebot will stay in voice channels without playing anything.
Set to 0 to stay in voice channels forever.
